thread.title: Video shows Tesla Model 3 prototype driving down the street
thread.title_full: Video shows Tesla Model 3 prototype driving down the street

author: Brett Williams
title: Video shows Tesla Model 3 prototype driving down the street
text:
Tesla lovers might have to wait until later this year for a shot at a ride in the electric carmaker's first crack at an "affordable" sedan, the Model 3 , but the prep for its release is ramping up.
Tesla recently announced Model 3 production will start ahead of initial projections in July — and a prototype of the car was just spotted out on the road IRL.
SEE ALSO: Tesla owners drop serious cash on their cars only to wait months to get them repaired
The video was posted by Unplugged Performance , a Tesla-centric mod shop that's conveniently located near the automaker's Design Studio in Hawthorne, California. Check it out below to see the shiny silver Model 3 zoom — okay, coast — along the SpaceX Hyperloop track, just to make the scene a little extra Musk-y.
Our office neighbors are the best! Model 3 driving outside our office alongside the SpaceX Hyperloop test track.
A post shared by Unplugged Performance (@unpluggedperformance) on Mar 9, 2017 at 2:55pm PST
The footage certainly isn't as thrilling as one of Tesla's record-breaking acceleration tests, but it's better than nothing.
WATCH: I tried a self-driving car in London and lived to tell the tale
